description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including rendering the puzzle grid, handling user interactions, and checking answers.

classes.name: puzInit
classes.description: Object containing methods to initialize and build the crossword puzzle, handle answer checking, and coordinate puzzle rendering.

classes.name: nav
classes.description: Object managing navigation between clues and entries within the crossword puzzle.

classes.name: util
classes.description: Utility functions for highlighting entries and clues, managing classes, and handling active positions.

methods.name: crossword
methods.description: Main function that initializes the crossword puzzle on a jQuery element, setting up the grid, clues, and interaction handlers.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the puzzle, sorts data, sets up event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for each puzzle entry based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table grid for the crossword puzzle based on calculated rows and columns.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry and adds clue labels.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the answer for the active entry and marks it as solved if correct.
